value.value: 35,000-40,000 P/A Pro rata depending on experience

description: <p>Vacancy: Senior Practice Nurse position in a Carshalton PCN practice. Hours and salary negotiable to meet the needs of the practice and to appoint the right person. This role will provide high quality, effective, evidence based nursing care and include the pro-active management of long term conditions as well as assessment, screening, preventative care, patient education and audit. The post holder will also be expected to support and supervise the practice nursing team (incl one nurse and one HCA), and work cohesively with other Clinicians, management and administrative colleagues. Sutton has a very active training hub to support the ongoing personal development of practice staff and opportunities will be available also in consideration with practice needs. For full details please see attached Job decription. If you wish to discuss any queries you have before applying or arrange a practice visit, please contact Practice Manager on 0208 644 7587 or email juliepomeroy@nhs.net</p>
title: Senior Practice Nurse
